item.title: The Dubai government is collaborating with Microsoft to develop a new font named "Dubai."
item.description:
Source: Dubai Government Media Office. The Dubai Crown Prince and Chairman of the Dubai Executive Council, Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid, has instructed the General Secretariat of the Dubai Executive Council to create a new font called “Dubai.” The initial phase will concentrate on developing unique Arabic and English fonts with advanced typographic capabilities. Sheikh Hamdan emphasized that this initiative will reinforce Dubai’s standing in information technology, aligning with the government’s strategy for leadership and innovation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-dubai-government-is-collaborating-with-microsoft-to-develop-a-new-font-named-dubai/

item.title: AIN has added English and Chinese websites for those interested in fashion
item.description:
Source: AIN English website. A Korean women’s fashion brand is aiming to become a global name, focusing particularly on mainland China, Hong Kong, and Singapore. AIN has seen positive results selling on international e-commerce platforms. To further expand its reach, the company has launched English and Chinese websites through cafe24,Â a leading Korean e-commerce platform. AIN’s CEO, Park A-In, shared that customers appreciate the brand’s distinct, contemporary designs and overall aesthetic...

item.title: The Free Learner's Dictionary provides limitless translations
item.description:
Dictionary.com’s Android app, with over 80 million downloads, now features a free Learner’s Dictionary. This addition provides users with comprehensive tools for professional success, from job searching to business meetings. English, as the dominant language in the business world, is used by approximately 565 million people online. According to a 2012 Harvard Business Review report, a growing number of companies, including major corporations like Airbus and Samsung, have adopted English as their official language...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-free-learner-s-dictionary-provides-limitless-translations/

item.title: Bookmate has expanded its collection of titles in the English language e-book section
item.description:
Bookmate, a subscription service for social e-reading, has broadened its English e-book collection through agreements with several publishers and distributors, including ePubDirect, ProfileBooks, Ingram, Diversion Books, Head of Zeus, Legend Press, and Casemate. This makes Bookmate the first subscription e-reading service outside the US to collaborate with ePubDirect. Notably, the deal with ePubDirect also encompasses Profile/Serpents Tail, Rosetta Books, and Icon Books. With these partnerships, Bookmate’s English selection surpasses 200,000 titles...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bookmate-has-expanded-its-collection-of-titles-in-the-english-language-e-book-section/
